body_html: No sparse matrix library I know of supports these operations, and SparseTensor was definitely not designed to support structured unary operations like this. It's meant to represent tensors with lots of zeros. Any functions that modify the sparsity structure of a dense version of the matrix have to be implemented similarly. One can always call tf.exp(st.values) themselves. Then it's very clear what's going on.
